name: Tychus
title: Notorious Outlaw
description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

abilities.name: Overkill
abilities.description: Deal 552 damage to the target and 276 damage to nearby targets over 4 seconds. Reactivate to select a new target. Can move and use Abilities while channeling.

abilities.name: Frag Grenade
abilities.description: Lob a grenade that deals 256 damage, knocking enemies away.

heroics.name: Commandeer Odin
heroics.description: Call down an Odin to pilot. The Odin deals increased Damage, has 100% increased Basic Attack range, and uses different Abilities. The Odin has 25 Armor and lasts 23 seconds.

heroics.name: Drakken Laser Drill
heroics.description: Call down a Laser Drill to attack nearby enemies, dealing 142 damage every second. Reactivate to assign a new target. Lasts 22 seconds.

original.name: Tychus
original.title: Notorious Outlaw
original.description: Tychus Findlay is a big man with a big ego and a bigger gun. Fortunately, his loyalty is easily won. Buy him a drink or three and promise him enough credits, and there's no job in the whole universe too dangerous for this outlaw.
original.shortDescription: An Assassin who shreds High Health enemies.

baseHeroInfo.name: Tychus
baseHeroInfo.title: Notorious Outlaw
baseHeroInfo.description: Tychus Findlay is a big man with a big ego and a bigger gun. Fortunately, his loyalty is easily won. Buy him a drink or three and promise him enough credits, and there's no job in the whole universe too dangerous for this outlaw.
baseHeroInfo.shortDescription: An Assassin who shreds High Health enemies.

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

trait.name: Minigun
trait.description: Activate to have Basic Attacks against Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 2.5% of their maximum Health. Lasts 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Overkill
abilities.description: Deal 552 damage to the target and 276 damage to nearby targets over 4 seconds. Reactivate to select a new target. Can move and use Abilities while channeling.

abilities.name: Frag Grenade
abilities.description: Lob a grenade that deals 256 damage, knocking enemies away.

heroicAbilities.name: Commandeer Odin
heroicAbilities.description: Call down an Odin to pilot. The Odin deals increased Damage, has 100% increased Basic Attack range, and uses different Abilities. The Odin has 25 Armor and lasts 23 seconds.

heroicAbilities.name: Drakken Laser Drill
heroicAbilities.description: Call down a Laser Drill to attack nearby enemies, dealing 142 damage every second. Reactivate to assign a new target. Lasts 22 seconds.

otherAbilities.name: Annihilate
otherAbilities.description: Fire the Odin's cannons in a straight line, dealing 196 damage to everything in the path.

otherAbilities.name: Ragnarok Missiles
otherAbilities.description: Launches a volley of missiles at target area, dealing 132 damage and slowing enemy Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds.

skins.name: Notorious Outlaw
skins.description: Tychus Findlay is a big man with a big ego and a bigger gun. Fortunately, his loyalty is easily won. Buy him a drink or three and promise him enough credits, and there's no job in the whole universe too dangerous for this outlaw.

skins.name: Custom Rig Tychus
skins.description: Sure, that suit may be his prison... But you and I both know that's not going to stop him from sprucing the thing up... Now, is it?

skins.name: Prisoner Tychus
skins.description: They say no one has ever escaped from New Folsom Prison. Wasn't too long ago that they were still right.

skins.name: Infested Tychus
skins.description: Maybe keeping that visor open on Char wasn't the best idea...
